full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO LA RNAM THAR GYI SGO NAS BSTOD CING GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I RAB TU BYED PA THOS PA DON LDAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,RNAM PAR GSOL 'DEBS THOS PA DON LDAN 'DI, ,DAD LDAN BLO DMAN RNAMS KYIS GO SLA'I PHYIR, ,DGE SLONG DPAL 'BYOR BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB KYIS, ,SE RA THEG CHEN GLING DU SMRAS PA DGE ,KHAMS GSUM 'GRO BA'I MGON PO RDO RJE 'CHANG, ,LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE'I SGYU 'PHRUL GAR, ,SE RA RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI, ,NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG RNAM THAR GSOL 'DEBS 'DI, ,THUB BSTAN RIN CHEN DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,'GRO KUN BDE SKYID DPAL LA SPYOD PA'I PHYIR, ,BSOD NAMS KUN SDUD GLING GI BLA BRANG NAS, ,GANG CI'I MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS TSE RABS PHRENG BAR MGON KHYOD KYIS, ,DGYES BZHIN RJES SU BZUNG NAS SA LAM GYI, ,BGROD PA YONGS SU RDZOGS TE LUS CAN KUN, ,'KHOR BA'I MTSO LAS MYUR DU 'DREN PAR SHOG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,
